Title: Gangoobai
Writer: Priya Krishnaswamy, Rayomand J. Patell (additional screenplay writer), Abhay Tiwari (dialogue)
Actors: Sarita Joshi, Purab Kohli, Mita Vasisht, Raj Zutshi
Plot: Gangoobai, a Maid-in-Matheran, has lived a life with simple aspirations, until one day she finds a new purpose of buying a designer sari. She follows her dream to the big city of Mumbai.
